root: ^Nathan Drake: You are back. Why are you in the middle? Give me an answer or take a bullet to the head!

c-0: ^You: Waahhhhhhh. No no, i feel so stressed… Why are you so… I don’t know!!!
^Nathan Drake: okay okay… look I was just making sure you didn’t orchestrate this whole thing… since, you know, you are in the middle…
^Nathan Drake: But it’s obvious you didn’t do it… now.
c-1: ^You: How should I know? In fact, why are you so comfortable with a gun? Why do I keep rotating?
^Nathan: Ok ok, calm down. Actually you being dead doesn’t help with anything.
g-0: ^Nathan: Did you see any way out? I have been in weirder situations, but… Still I prefer a warm bed and a hot meal if I can take one.

c-0: ^You: I think we are all locked in. It’s just I can switch between you guys.
c-1: ^You: Can you get out of your seat? You seem quite capable of… adventuring.
g-0: ^Nathan:  Great. I am just gonna sit here and see you spin like a microwave dish.
^Kermit: Oh ho ho, that was a funny line.
^System Announcement: The center should prevent interviewees from direct interaction. Administering electric shock to the center.
g-1: ^System Announcement: Administering electric shock to the center.
^Nathan: Whoever is on the other side, stop talking.

c-4: ^You: I am so glad I am alive. Never again!
c-5: ^You: I am ok, I am ok. Please stop talking to each other over me.

g-2: ^Nathan: Why are you spinning around? What is the play here?

c-6: ^You: I am just making conversations, it has been fun I must say.
c-7: ^You: It’s not like there is a lot for me to do.

g-3: ^Nathan: What were you doing before you ended up here?

c-8: ^You: I was moseying towards the trash disposal, then this giant beam… you know how it is.
^Nathan: Hey, giant beams and what not, still better than a domestic life.
c-9: ^You: I was driving, on the highway, with my babe…
^Nathan: Totally. Anything but sit on the couch watching tv right?

g-4: ^Nathan: So you have no skill, but that’s okay. We are all in this together. Keep an eye recruiting others to escape alright?

c-11: ^You: I have skills! I have been a professional assistant to the regional manager for many years.
c-12: ^You: Should we keep this quiet? What if they hear us?
^Nathan: If anything was going to happen, then it should have happened.
